DESCRIPTION: Bans a user from the server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}ban @user reason** ~ Bans the user from the server.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: The role of G4M3R needs to be above the highest role to moderate effectively. Make sure the bot has the permissions to ban on your server.
NEED_BAN_PERMS: I do not have the Ban Members permission.
ALREADY_BANNED: This user is already banned on your server.
NEED_USER: You did not provide a user to ban.
NEED_REASON: You must provide a reason in order to ban the user.
SUCCESS: Banned {{user}} from this server with reason: **{{reason}}**
USER_TOO_LOW: Your highest role is not high enough to ban this member.
BOT_TOO_LOW: Could not ban this member, make sure that my role is above the highest role of the user you want to ban and try again.
TITLE: {{username}}, you have been **BANNED** from [{{guildName}}]
